originalText.text: Worst Delivery of any pharmacy I've ever used! There's a New delivery person and for 3 days I've been told my medications are coming and NOTHING!! IRRESPONSIBLE and I'm here without meds that I need and been taking for 10 yrs,, I'm unable to pick up in person but I will be changing this pharmacy!!!

originalText.text: The owner is amazing,the staff is very friendly,my medicines always on time!

originalText.text: The people here are amazing and kind. They care very much for their customers and make you feel right at home. I have been a customer here for the longest time and even though I moved to a different location, I still remain their customer!

text.text: The people here are amazing and kind. They care very much for their customers and make you feel right at home. I have been a customer here for the longest time and even though I moved to a different location, I still remain their customer!

originalText.text: They website says they open at 9:00 but you have to wait outside until the pharmacist arrives. And take forever to dispense the meds.

text.text: They website says they open at 9:00 but you have to wait outside until the pharmacist arrives. And take forever to dispense the meds.

originalText.text: The owners and or workers of this store are very kind and helpful. They take a stressful situation and fix it with the best of their ability which is not much but a very comforting gesture. For example, I had a Dr. Mess up on a script and instead of just giving me the medication and putting me on my way they took the initiative called the doctor and fix the problem all witjiut me lifting a finger or dialing a number.  They also are very accomadating not to mention the clean organized setup they have but it was my first time there and my doctor sent my script to this pharmacy instead of my usual and they were able to make me more comfortable and appreciative of them having my business that they provide me with a choice of any toiletries or products I want up to 20 dollars.  If you don't shop for toiletries they you wouldn't know how key that is.  By this amazing gesture they have saved me tons of money and today I use them for almost all my medication scripts. So I'd you guys are ready. ing this I would like to say keep up the good work Ns I mean it when ibsaybyoubhavwbthrbmost organized and cleanest pharmacy I have ver been in To. Allnyiut profcutdbsnd items are lined up perfectly on thr shelve with just thr right amount of bottles for every row to make it look full yet clean, which allows the customer to findbehstbthereblookibg forbquickefbsndbbybgiving them a better view to look at other options they might have not noticed before.  Also you carry all the top shelf products of every category of products ranging from tanning lotionbtobshsmooobto even a high quality Epson salt that you just wouldn't find at a usual pharmacy.  This gives me a better  product at the same price that I would be getting at some other generic mom and pops storror corporate oharmacynbbkeeobuobthr good work.
